com.strandgenomics.imaging.iclient
Interface ImageSpaceWorkflow

All Known Implementing Classes:
ImageSpaceSystem
public interface ImageSpaceWorkflow

Service to enable workflow - executing of task/pipeline by the server

Author:
arunabha

Method Detail

getPublisher

Publisher getPublisher(Application application)
Returns the publisher of the specified application

Parameters:
application - the application
Returns:
the publisher for the specified application

executeApplication

Job executeApplication(Application application,
                       Map<String,Object> parameters,
                       Priority priority,
                       String projectName,
                       long... guids)
Executes the specified registered-application with the specified parameters (if any) on the specified list of records as input

Parameters:
application - the application pre-registered with the server (through plugins to compute-server)
parameters - the parameters to run the application
guids - the input records
priority - priority of the task (running application) under consideration
Returns:
an handle to the remotely executing task

scheduleApplication

Job scheduleApplication(Application application,
                        Map<String,Object> parameters,
                        Priority priority,
                        String projectName,
                        long scheduleTime,
                        long... guids)
Schedules the specified registered-application for execution with the specified parameters (if any) on the specified list of records as input

Parameters:
application - the application pre-registered with the server (through plugins to compute-server)
parameters - the parameters to run the application
records - the input records
priority - priority of the task (running application) under consideration
scheduleTime - time in milliseconds
Returns:
an handle to the remotely executing task

listApplications

List<Application> listApplications(Publisher publisher,
                                   String categoryName)
Returns the list of available application with the given category and from the specified publisher

Parameters:
publisher - publisher (null will mean a listing across all publisher)
categoryName - name of the category (null will mean a listing across all categories)
Returns:
list of available applications

getParameters

Set<Parameter> getParameters(Application application)
Returns the required application specific parameters for the specified application

Parameters:
application - application under consideration
Returns:
a list of relevant parameters or null, if nothing there

getJobState

State getJobState(Job job)
Returns the state of the task submitted for execution

Parameters:
job - handle to the remotely executing task
Returns:
the status code. one of SCHEDULED,WAITING,PAUSED,ALLOCATED,EXECUTING,DELETING, DELETED,ERROR,SUCCESS,TERMINATED

rescheduleTask

boolean rescheduleTask(Job job,
                       long rescheduleTime)
Reschedule the specified job which is still to be allocated (to a worker for execution)

Parameters:
job - handle to the remotely executing task
rescheduleTime - the new wait time interval
Returns:
true if successful, false otherwise

getTaskOutputs

long[] getTaskOutputs(String accessToken,
                      long jobID)
Returns the list of Record GUIDs which are potentially created by this Job Note that is call is valid only after the said job is ended successfully

Parameters:
job - handle to the remotely executing task
Returns:
list of Records (their GUID) that are create or null if there are none
